alternativeNames: Christ, Hermann; Christ, H.; Christ, D.H.
comments: Usually published as 'H.Christ'.  Sometimes name appeared at title as 'D.H.Christ' instead of Dr. H.Christ.
examples: 'S' example: Alsine gayana Webb. ex Christ in Bot. Jahrb., 9: 109, 159 (1888).
source: Pichi Sermolli's list, 3 March 1991 from H.T.Clifford's list of Palaeobotanists. Bibliogr. in Verh. Naturf. Ges. Basel, 35: 7-18 (1923) [Festschrift for 90th birthday], portr. opposite title page.
